description:
Kitay Law Offices has a location in Kennett Square, Pennsylvania, from which we deliver highly personalized and unmatched counsel and support to a diverse range of clients throughout Chester County and beyond who have legal needs involving any of the following areas:

  • Personal injury
  • Car and other motor vehicle accidents
  • Workers' compensation
  • DUI defense
  • Criminal defense
  • Immigration law

With a history that dates back more than 25 years, we have become one of Pennsylvania's most trusted sources for quality, effective legal counsel. As evidence of our success, our law firm has grown to include six total offices across the state.

We have achieved this unprecedented level of success by always providing the highest level of representation possible to those we serve, and you can rely on us to sit with you and discuss your options to help you make the best-informed decisions. We will then work tirelessly to help you achieve your goals and the favorable outcomes you seek. Since initially establishing our firm, we have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for our plaintiff injury clients while assisting many others with the complex legal challenges affecting their lives and futures.

To discuss your legal matter with a member of our team at no cost, you can contact Kitay Law Offices by phone or through our website to schedule a free initial consultation. We offer full bilingual services in Spanish and English, and you can speak to us by phone or via videoconference if you're more comfortable doing one of those options than physically coming into one of our law offices.
